name: Pixel Bob
description:
Just beat the devil out of it.

Steve Controls

Connect a controller to spawn your Steve.

Dpad: Move Cursor

Left Control Stick: Move

Left Trigger: Boost

Right Trigger:Power Brake

A : Knife

B + Left Trigger: Heavy Knife

X : Respawn (N/A)

Y: Show Score (N/A)

1-9: Pain T (N/A)

Bob Controls

WASD: Move

Left Click: Boost

Right Click: Power Brake

CTR + C = Show Controller Connection

When in doubt, VELOCITA!

100% of donations go to itch.io

#ITCH.IO MASTER RACE
